short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows the karrieretutor.de lesson available at avendoo.de in a prettier way

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugins is for users which have access to lessons at karrieretutor.avandoo.de. It allows to acces the lessons in an easier way by modifying some DOM elements on the page. 

Main features are:
- Vertical Scrolling replaces with responsive design
- Initial focus of first unread module.

There is no warranty for this product, so feel free to use.
